translations.en:
: ** :park: You see a river in front of you. On the other shore, you catch a glimpse of a village.

:swimmer: Swim across the river.
:rowboat: Try to make a raft.
:bridge_at_night: Look for a bridge further away.
:walking: Go another way.

*-Use reaction to make an action :warning: Not responding is considered a separate choice!*

translations.fr: ** | ğŸš¶ Vous dÃ©cidez de partir dans un autre sens, mais vous mettez une bonne heure avant de trouver une direction qui vous convienne !
translations.en: ** | ğŸš¶ You decide to go in another direction, but it takes you an entire hour to find a direction that suits you!

translations.en: ** | ğŸŠ The water is frozen over! You motivate yourself and dive. Once on the other side, you realize your mistake. You are freezing and weakened. You will need to heal before continuing! :cold_face:

L'eau est gelÃ©e, mais vous parvenez tant bien que mal Ã  atteindre l'autre rive, gelÃ© et affaibli. Il faudra vous soigner avant de continuer ! :cold_face:
translations.en: ** | ğŸš£ After spending several hours building your raft, you start to cross the river... and sink miserably in the middle. The water is freezing, but you barely reach the other side, freezing and weakened. You will need to be treated before you can continue! :cold_face:

translations.fr: ** | ğŸš£ Vous fabriquez une petite barque en quelques heures et vous atteignez l'autre cÃ´tÃ© facilement. En sortant de votre bateau vous ramassez un objet qui, Ã  dÃ©faut de vous servir, sera facile Ã  revendre !
translations.en: ** | ğŸš£ You build a small raft in a few hours and reach the other side easily. When you leave your raft, you pick up an object that, if you don't use, will be easy to sell!

translations.fr: ** | ğŸŒ‰ Au bout de 30 minutes vous finissez par abandonner et vous reprenez votre route dans une autre direction...
translations.en: ** | ğŸŒ‰ After 30 minutes you finally give up and continue on your way in another direction...

translations.en: ** | ğŸŒ‰ After 60 minutes, you finally find a river crossing. You decide not to go to the village, now too far away, and continue your journey in another direction.

translations.en: ** | ğŸŒ‰ After a few minutes you find a little wooden bridge. You quickly reach the village where the locals, happy to meet a stranger for the first time in years, offer you some coins.

translations.fr: ** | ğŸŒ‰ Au bout de quelques minutes vous trouvez un petit pont en bois. translations.en: ** | ğŸŒ‰ After a while you finally discover a wooden bridge. Sadly, it is in very bad condition because it has not been used for a long time. After you cross half the bridge, it collapses. You manage to cross the river but you are completely soaked. Confounded by this mishap, you will need to rest before continuing! :confounded:

translations.fr: ** | :clock1030: Au bout de quelques heures au bord de la riviÃ¨re, vous finissez par repartir dans une direction alÃ©atoire.
translations.en: ** | :clock1030: After a few hours on the riverside, you finally walk away in a random direction.
